Title: Oblivion 2: Backlash
Writer: Charles Band (story), Peter David, Mark Goldstein (story), John Rheaume (story), Greg Suddeth (story)
Actors: Richard Joseph Paul, Jackie Swanson, Andrew Divoff, Meg Foster
Plot: In the alien-western world of Oblivion, a suave, yet lethal bounty hunter named Sweeney arrives to arrest the seductive outlaw Lash on multiple charges, including murder. Lash, who just "inherited" a mine of Derconium (the most valuable mineral in the universe) from Crowley in a game of cards, meets up with Redeye's brother, Jaggar, who wants the mine for himself to rule the galaxy. It's a fight over Lash between the sheriff of Oblivion, Jaggar, and Sweeney. But who will emerge victorious?
